text:
this is a snippet I saved for getting things you may be able to rework the logic?

using hubl inside a hubl selector
```{{ row['category_' ~ language_tag] }}```
e.g. the equivalent of {{ row.category_en }} where en is a hubl variable {{ language_tag }}

Is there HubL for getting the Blog Social Sharing settings? I didn't see anything in the blog post markup. Also thought maybe the default Social Sharing module was controlled by it but it has more socials than what's in the settings.

The boilerplate has a social follow module, inside you can view it’s HubL.

Here’s how it’s put together:
<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/blob/main/src/modules/social-follow.module/module.html#L85-L126>
The social share buttons in settings controls what the social share HubL tag renders.
